title: Application Fees Per Apartment, Not Per Person, Fitness Center, Sauna
posting_body: ['Solaire is a smoke-free, luxury apartment community for seniors 62 years of age and better who prefer a serene lifestyle.', 'We have studios, one, two and three bedroom apartments with spacious closets, carpeted floors, balconies, and patios.', 'Solaire is a welcoming community with on-site beauty salon, library, community center, weekly activities, sauna, fitness center, pool, laundry, and much more.', 'Don’t miss your chance to enjoy peaceful living at Solaire, call today!', '-Community Center', '-Fitness Center', '-Secured Entry with Intercom', '-Automatic Payment Options Available', '-Free Wi-Fi', '-Central Air Conditioning', '-Generous Resident Referral Program', '-Elevator/s', '-New/Renovated Interior', '-Linen Closet', '-Late Fee Forgiveness', '-On-Site Beauty Salon', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
